description: Owned multiple technical projects, translating stakeholder requirements into user stories and prioritised backlogs to drive delivery.
Led Agile ceremonies (stand-ups, retrospectives, sprint planning), boosting cross-team collaboration and improving delivery cadence.
Defined product roadmaps with clients, aligning deliverables to business goals and user feedback for continuous iteration.
Developed and integrated CRM solutions (Salesforce, HubSpot), driving a 15% increase in retention across key accounts.
Created custom software solutions, cutting operational costs by 15% for healthcare and ecommerce sectors.
Optimised API integrations and data pipelines, enabling seamless connectivity across analytics, CRM, and advertising platforms.
Created client-facing reports and executive presentations, translating technical details and project outcomes into strategic narratives.
Coordinated Agile workflows and stakeholder meetings to support strategic decision-making.
Performed comprehensive business requirement analysis to deliver tailored GRC and CRM solutions, improving client satisfaction by 20%.
Collaborated with Product Managers to define MVP features and support Agile sprints.
Conducted user research and stakeholder interviews to shape product enhancements.
Delivered insights from analytics and data science to support strategic decisions.
Designed and implemented dashboards (Python, JavaScript, SQL), increasing sales and investment by 20%.
Improved data integration strategies and reduced redundancy by 30%.
Managed QA & UAT testing phases, reducing defects by 30%.
Mentored analysts and standardised best practices in data governance.
Aligned cross-functional teams to ensure timely delivery of key initiatives.
Leveraged CRM tools and market analysis to increase sales by 20%.
Optimised CRM processes to enhance customer experience, reducing wait times by 25%.
Consistently exceeded KPIs in a high-traffic environment.
Managed online transactions and daily cash reconciliations to ensure compliance.
Provided excellent customer service in a high-paced hospitality environment.
Multitasked efficiently while maintaining professionalism and energy.
Managed, trained, and monitored staff when needed to optimise standards and sales.
Exceeded daily targets through exceptional product knowledge and enthusiasm.
Ensured safety and security of fans while enhancing the match-day experience.
Mediated conflicts using NVQ-trained communication and conflict resolution skills.
Monitored crowd behaviour, preventing incidents proactively.
Followed all safety protocols and incident escalation procedures.
Learned payroll systems and improved process efficiency through creativity.
Organised and filed correspondence in chronological order.
Built financial reports and profit/loss sheets using Excel formulas.
Shadowed chartered accountants and assisted with client accounts.
